text: The Noblest of Men, and a Woman
tip_detailed: Start: Valentine Saloon with Theodore Levin. Track 5 legendary gunslingers for his biography.

After 1 day. Go fishing, catch "The Great Tyrant" legendary pike. 6AM-6PM only.
After 1 day. Track and hunt wolves with Hamish. Watch for ambush!
Final part. Hamish is killed by boar. Kill boar, get Buell + Giant Boar Tusk.
Find Charlotte mourning her husband. Give her food.
After 1 day. Teach her to hunt rabbits with a rifle.
Final visit. She has learned to survive. Get supplies.

Near Window Rock, look for tree with carved symbol (Earth). Leads to next clue.
Another carved tree (Water symbol). Follow the pattern.
Third carved tree (Fire symbol). Combines all elements.
Summit of Mount Shann. Behind the sundial stone structure. 2 GOLD BARS!
Random encounter after Chapter 3 "The New South". Treasure hunter hanging from cliff near Cumberland Falls. Save or loot body.
Behind the waterfall! Climb rocks on LEFT side, enter cave behind falls. Chest against wall.
Frozen pond in Ambarino. NE of Mount Hagen. Search under fallen tree on east shore.
DO NOT enter fort! Cliff ABOVE fort on east side. Jump down carefully. 3 GOLD BARS!
Treasure hunter NW of Flatneck Station, on ridge overlooking river. Sells for $10 (or $5 if haggle). Can also rob him.
Rock formation south of Valentine. Climb from SE side, follow path along cliff. Map in hollow rock (hole in white granite).
West end of springs, circle of rock formations. Search central rock pile. Pearl Necklace bonus.
Small island in lake. Search rock on SE side of island. 2 GOLD BARS!
Limpany ruins SW of Horseshoe Overlook. Jailhouse still standing - corpse inside has map.
Cornwall Freight Station underground passage connecting yard to harbor. Check wall near wooden crate.
Mausoleum with stained glass window, west of central dome. Inspect left wall. 6 GOLD BARS!
North of Annesburg. Aggressive hermit with shotgun! Check drawer inside cabin.
NW West Elizabeth, follow Little Creek River. Another hostile hermit. Check inside.

North of lighthouse, south of Van Horn. Stone pile near coast. 4 GOLD BARS!
